overview: Halloween is creeping up on us and we dip our toes early in its murky swamp-like waters with this offering from Lesbea. Inspired by the movie "Black Swan" this scene plays with what the reality of a lesbian fantasy could have been. As the white swan Odette moves delicately she is unaware of Odile the black swan approaching. Odile teases the white swan, casting her spell before devouring her mind, body and soul.
title: Dirty Little Games
